about_the_game: Zombie Hunter is an extremely challenging survival, construction, shooting, horror game. You'll have to survive in the vast world, hunting more and more powerful zombies, crafting tools and building materials, building buildings, hunting animals, growing crops quickly, exploring islands and performing missions. It is extremely difficult to survive. The demo version has less content than the original, but it is enough for players to play and is updated regularly.

It is extremely difficult to survive. The demo version has less content than the original, but it is enough for players to play and is updated regularly.
